content: 4 and 5 do not break your main coloured yarn round 1 k 17 19 21 work row 1 of the turn your work so the ws is facing you you strawberry pattern knit to end of round are now going to be working back and forth round 2 k 17 19 21 work next row of the on the next 28 32 36 sts the remaining 28 strawberry pattern knit to end of round 32 36 sts are the front of the sock and will be left unworked for now repeat round 2 until you have completed all 16 row of the strawberry pattern row 1 ws sl1 p 27 31 35 continue working as established completing row 2 rs sl1 k1 repeat across 28 32 36 the strawberry pattern 4 times 64 rounds in sts total repeat row 1 and 2 13 15 17 more times 14 16 18 in total right leg then work row 1 once more the pattern is worked on the front of the sock only the back of the sock is worked in plain 2 strawberry cheesecake socks by debbie ford heel turn foot row 1 rs sl1 k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn continue working in established pattern until the foot measures 4 cm / 1 5 inches less than row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn desired foot length i recommend ending row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before your last turn having worked row 8 or 16 of the strawberry ssk using 1 st from each side of the gap k1 pattern turn if using contrast yarn for the toes break yarn row 4 ws sl1 p to 1 st before your last here and start working with your contrast turn p2tog using 1 st from each side of the colour now gap p1 turn right foot repeats row 3-4 until all stitches have been set up round this will be your bor place a worked marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and you will have 18 20 22 sts on your needle k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap break and the rs should be facing you contrast yarn and start working with main colour yarn here pick up 1 extra st in the gusset ladder from the row below and k tbl pm k 5 now you are going to start working in the 7 9 work row 1 of the strawberry pattern round again k 16 18 20 pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pick up left foot and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap set up round this will be your bor place a round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm k marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and 5 7 9 work next row of the strawberry k 14 16 18 sts along your heel
